channel.title: debugging on Puneeth
channel.description: Recent content in debugging on Puneeth

item.title: September 18, 2020
item.description: Python Debugging pdb is a standard python debuger and to invoke it we can call brakpoint() in scripts or use %pdb magic in iPython. Documentation In pdb pythons standard debugger, help command directs you further. Some shortcuts are n next line, s step into, c for continue. You can do anything w.r.t ipython shell. IPython trics: All and more about useful ipython %magic and debugging can be found here: Great reference: https://jakevdp.
